   Description  
________________
_______________________________________________________________
Bryan (Liam Neeson), a former secret agent living in the US. 
He is skilled in hand to hand combat, divorced; and loves his 
17-year-old daughter Kim (Maggie Grace) who lives with his 
ex-wife and her new husband Stuart (Xander Berkeley). Kim 
wants to take a vacation in Europe with her friend Amanda 
(Katie Cassidy), and together follow U2&#039;s European tour. 
Kim&#039;s mother allows this, but Kim also needs permission from
 her father. Since Kim fears that Bryan will not consent, 
she pretends that they will only stay in Paris. Reluctantly, 
Bryan agrees.
